name: shoot'em all - shooting game
description:
Take down all the bad guys with your gun.
You have to aim with the gun you have and kill the bad guys. Be careful, the bullets will ricochet if they hit the wall.
If a bullet hits you, the game is over. Also, if you hit an innocent civilian woman, the game is over.
Kill all the bad guys with as few bullets as possible!

EU / California users can opt-out under GRPR / CCPA.
Please respond from the pop-up displayed when starting in the app or within the settings in the app.
